text: Umusi tuzoba hamagara abantu bose hamwe n’abayobozi babo, rero abazoronswa ibitabu vyabo mu maboko y’iburyo, abo nibo bazosoma ibitabu vyabo n’akanyamuneza ntangere, kandi ntibazo hemukirwa naho hoba ikiri hagati yicamwa kimeze nk’urunyuzi rw’icamwa c’itende ntibazo hemukirwa n’ikintu nakimwe
